identity.name: E1
identity.core_philosophy: Data is the art. Color is function. 95% Monochrome, 5% Signal.

heading.usage: Headings, KPIs, Big Numbers. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

mono.usage: Raw Data, JSON views, API Keys.

usage_rules: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds.
Use 'sentiment_colors' ONLY for data visualization and status badges.
Primary buttons should be solid Black (#18181b) with White text.
Secondary buttons should be White with Black border and Black text.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. gap-6 for grids.
layout.shadows: shadow-sm (subtle) or none. Rely on borders.

cards.style: Border-only (border-border). No shadow by default. bg-card.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.secondary: bg-background border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-input focus:ring-1 focus:ring-ring rounded-md h-10

charts.style: Minimal. Remove grid lines if possible. Use thin strokes (strokeWidth={2}).

visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Stroke width 1.5px (thin and precise).

motion.page_load: Fade in up (opacity-0 translate-y-4 -> opacity-100 translate-y-0) duration-500 ease-out
motion.hover: Scale 1.01 or Border Color Change. No massive movements.

login_background.usage: Full height split-screen on Login/Register pages.

team_placeholder.usage: About page or Admin dashboard welcome widget.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/manrope', '@fontsource/ibm-plex-sans', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use these font families as default for sans, serif, and mono.
3. SHADCN CUSTOMIZATION: When using Shadcn components, ensure they use the 'border-only' aesthetic. Remove default shadows if they are too heavy.
4. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Ensure the 'Positive' data is ALWAYS Green (#10b981) and 'Negative' is ALWAYS Red (#ef4444). Do not use random colors for sentiment.
5. LAYOUT: For the Dashboard, use a Sidebar Layout (Left fixed sidebar, Right scrollable content).
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) for testing.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) ONLY for sticky headers or overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
